# Analyses bivariées

## Packages nécéssaires

```{r}
install.packages("FactoMineR")
install.packages("factoextra")  # pour les graphiques
library(FactoMineR)
library(factoextra)
```

```{r}
summary(pisa3$READ)

summary(pisa3$MATH) 
```

```{r}
hist(pisa3$READ)
```

```{r}
hist(pisa3$MATH)
```

```{r}
data <- 
res.pca <- PCA(data, scale.unit = TRUE, graph = FALSE)
```

```{r}
cor(x = pisa3$READ, y = pisa3$MATH, method = "pearson")
```

```{r}
aov <- aov(pisa3$ST315Q07JA ~ pisa3$MATH, data = pisa3)
```

```{r}
aov <- summary(aov)
```

```{r}
z <- aov[[1]][["Sum Sq"]][1]
zz <- aov[[1]][["Sum Sq"]][2]
```

```{r}
z / (z +zz)
```

```{r}
boxplot(pisa3$MATH ~ pisa3$ST315Q07JA, col="lightblue")
```

```{r}
cor(pisa3$MATH, pisa3$ST315Q07JA)
```

```{r}
boxplot(pisa3$READ ~ pisa3$ST315Q07JA, col="lightblue")
```
